b: ^ And here comes a new knight, motivated by glory and wealth.
^ You know, Sir Lume, you'd have better luck finding a princess by leaving this place rather than waking me up at this late hour!

Encounter1: ^I beg your pardon, Dragon? I'm not motivated by such a lowly goal.
^That's intriguing... Very well, I admit I underestimated you...
^Haha, but you're right, Dragon! I, Sir Lume, am only motivated by the idea of saving the damsels in distress you dare to capture!
^I take back what I said... I don't know who made you believe such nonsense.
^Come on, don't lie, Dragon, everyone knows that creatures like you enjoy that kind of thing...
^I only enjoy gold coins and sleeping in, knight... So enough chit-chat, let's fight.
Encounter2: ^Haha, your lies don't fool me, Dragon, I know they're being held prisoner deep in your dungeon.
^No! I don't do that kind of thing, knight, the only time it happened, the princess gave me my only scar that  never fully healed!
^See? Now stop telling your nonsense and let's fight!
